oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fifth Avenue looking north from Church Street, 1910
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A postcard of Fifth Avenue looking north from Church Street in downtown Nashville. Both sides of the street are lined with businesses including Castner Knott and Blach's, both department stores. Some carriages are parked on the sides of the road, and pedestrians busily walk up and down the street. Forms part of the Norton Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Castner Knott Department Store (Nashville, Tenn.); Blach's (Firm)
